items.summary: In Virtual Pet Hub, when the user presses the “Feed Pet” button, make the pet display perform an immediate, clearly visible reaction (not just a toast). The reaction must be shown in the pet visual area and should last briefly (e.g., ~1–2 seconds) before returning to idle.

In Virtual Pet Hub, when the user presses the “Play” button, make the pet display perform an immediate, clearly visible reaction distinct from the Feed reaction (not just a toast). The reaction must be shown in the pet visual area and should last briefly (e.g., ~1–2 seconds) before returning to idle.

Ensure Feed/Play reactions do not block normal usage: buttons must remain functional and the page must not crash if actions are triggered repeatedly. If a user triggers an action while an animation is already playing, either restart the animation cleanly or queue/replace it in a predictable way.
